mapper.select: SELECT M.NO ,M.NAME ,M.EMAIL ,M.PWD ,M.PRIVATE_EMAIL ,M.GRADE ,M.ADDRESS ,M.ADDRESS2 ,M.PHONE ,M.PROFILE_NAME ,M.POSITION_NO ,M.BANK_NO ,M.ACCOUNT ,TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS ENROLL_DATE ,TO_CHAR(M.UPDATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS UPDATE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(M.START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(M.QUIT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS QUIT_DATE ,M.QUIT_YN ,P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO JOIN RANK R ON P.RANK_NO = R.NO JOIN DEPT D ON P.DEPT_NO = D.NO WHERE EMAIL = #{email} AND PWD = #{pwd} AND QUIT_YN = 'N'

SELECT M.NO ,M.NAME ,M.EMAIL ,M.PWD ,M.PRIVATE_EMAIL ,M.GRADE ,M.ADDRESS ,M.ADDRESS2 ,M.PHONE ,M.PROFILE_NAME ,M.POSITION_NO ,M.BANK_NO ,M.ACCOUNT ,TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS ENROLL_DATE ,TO_CHAR(M.UPDATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS UPDATE_DATE ,TO_CHAR(M.START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS START_DATE ,TO_CHAR(M.QUIT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS QUIT_DATE ,M.QUIT_YN ,P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO JOIN RANK R ON P.RANK_NO = R.NO JOIN DEPT D ON P.DEPT_NO = D.NO WHERE M.NO = #{no}

SELECT M.NO, M.NAME, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, M.PROFILE_NAME, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO JOIN RANK R ON P.RANK_NO = R.NO JOIN DEPT D ON P.DEPT_NO = D.NO WHERE DEPT_NO = #{deptNo} AND M.QUIT_YN = 'N' ORDER BY P.RANK_NO DESC, P.NO ASC

SELECT M.NO, M.NAME, M.EMAIL, M.PHONE, M.PROFILE_NAME, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, R.NAME AS RANK_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPT_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO JOIN RANK R ON P.RANK_NO = R.NO JOIN DEPT D ON P.DEPT_NO = D.NO WHERE M.NAME LIKE '%${search}%' AND M.QUIT_YN = 'N' ORDER BY P.NO ASC

SELECT B.NO ,M.NAME AS USER_NO ,B.TITLE ,B.CONTENT ,B.HIT ,TO_CHAR(B.REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE ,M.POSITION FROM DATA_BOARD B JOIN (SELECT M.NAME ,M.NO ,M.PROFILE_NAME ,P.NAME AS POSITION FROM MEMBER M JOIN POSITION P ON M.POSITION_NO = P.NO) M ON B.USER_NO = M.NO WHERE B.DELETE_YN = 'N'
AND B.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{title} || '%'
AND M.NO = ${memberNo}; ORDER BY B.NO DESC
